Package a3

Class GhostManager

java.lang.Object
a3.GhostManager
public class GhostManager extends Object
Manages all ghost avatars in the multiplayer environment.

GhostManager is responsible for creating, updating, and removing ghost avatars which represent other players in the game world. It maintains a list of currently active ghost avatars and ensures that each is uniquely identified by a UUID.

Author:
Isabel Santoyo-Garcia

    • GhostManager

      public GhostManager(VariableFrameRateGame vfrg)
      Constructs a GhostManager linked to the current game instance.
      Parameters:

  • Method Details

    • createGhost

      public void createGhost(UUID id, org.joml.Vector3f p, String color) throws IOException
      Creates and adds a new ghost avatar to the scene.
      Parameters:
      id - The unique identifier for the ghost avatar.
      p - The initial position of the ghost in world coordinates.
      Throws:
      IOException - if the shape or texture loading fails.

    • removeGhostAvatar

      public void removeGhostAvatar(UUID id)
      Removes a ghost avatar from the scene and internal list.
      Parameters:
      id - The UUID of the ghost avatar to remove.

    • cleanGhostAvatars

      public void cleanGhostAvatars(float dtSec)
      Periodically cleans up stale or invalid ghost avatars.
      Parameters:
      dtSec - Elapsed time in seconds since the last update.

    • updateGhostPosition

      public void updateGhostPosition(UUID ghostID, org.joml.Vector3f position)
      Updates the position of a ghost avatar. If the ghost doesn't exist yet, this method creates it.
      Parameters:
      ghostID - The UUID of the ghost avatar.
      position - The new position to set.

    • getGhostAvatar

      public GhostAvatar getGhostAvatar(UUID id)
      Retrieves an existing ghost avatar instance.
      Parameters:
      id - The UUID of the ghost.
      Returns:
      The GhostAvatar, or null if not found.

    • updateGhostRotation

      public void updateGhostRotation(UUID id, org.joml.Quaternionf q)
      Updates a ghostâ€™s orientation.
      Parameters:
      id - The UUID of the ghost.
      q - The new rotation quaternion.

    • setGhostWatering

      public void setGhostWatering(UUID id, boolean on)
      Sets whether a ghost avatar is currently watering.
      Parameters:
      id - The UUID of the ghost.
      on - True to show watering-can and spawn droplets.

    • updateAllGhostCans

      public void updateAllGhostCans()
      Called each frame from MyGame.update() to position watering-cans.

    • updateAllGhostDroplets

      public void updateAllGhostDroplets(float dtSec)
      Called each frame from MyGame.update() to spawn and update droplets.
      Parameters:
      dtSec - elapsed time in seconds since last update

    • ghostPlant

      public void ghostPlant(UUID who, UUID cropId, org.joml.Vector3f pos, String type)
      Handles a ghost planting action by creating a Crop and GameObject.
      Parameters:
      who - The avatar UUID who planted.
      cropId - The UUID of the new crop.
      pos - The planting position.
      type - "Carrot" or "Wheat".

    • ghostHarvest

      public void ghostHarvest(UUID who, UUID cropId)
      Handles a ghost harvesting action, removing the crop.
      Parameters:
      who - The avatar UUID who harvested.
      cropId - The UUID of the harvested crop.

    • ghostGrow

      public void ghostGrow(UUID who, UUID cropId, org.joml.Vector3f pos, String type)
      Handles a ghost growth event, forcing the crop to mature.
      Parameters:
      who - The avatar UUID whose crop grew.
      cropId - The UUID of the growing crop.

    • updateAllGhostCrops

      public void updateAllGhostCrops()
      Called each frame from MyGame.update() to advance growth on all ghost crops.

    • getColor

      public String getColor(UUID id)
      Retrieves the color name assigned to a ghost.
      Parameters:
      id - The UUID of the ghost.
      Returns:
      Color name, or "White" if not set.

    • setGhostTorch

      public void setGhostTorch(UUID id, boolean on)
      Toggles a ghostâ€™s torch GameObject and its positional light.
      Parameters:
      id - The UUID of the ghost.
      on - True to enable torch.

    • updateAllGhostTorches

      public void updateAllGhostTorches()
      Called each frame from MyGame.update() to position torch objects.
